title.en: Dare ni mo Himitsu no Koi Monogatari

description.en:
[*]1) Hoshi sae mo Nemuru Yoru by Miyuki Kitagawa
(The Banquet of Stars) Kana goes along with her friends on a trip for Golden Week, and they happen to visit an island that she had once seen a picture of the stars from.

[*]2) No Panties Musume by Ako Shimaki
Roux comes from another country and lives with Ichiko, a smart player who fools around with all the girls. She doesn't wear panties because it's not a part of her culture...? And kissing is a casual greeting!?
(Also included in Boku ni Natta Watashi vol 2)

[*]3) Tomodachi Shikkaku by Akane Kasuga
Riku, a cute girl, steals the attention of all the girls from a jealous guy. He doesn't see her as a real girl, but she still likes him.

[*]4) Koi no Neiro by Shin Yumachi
(The Melody of Love) Chizeru believes that Kaitou hates her, and is therefore scared of him. Things just aren't what they seem on the surface though.

[*]5) Yuuwaku Lesson Itashimasho by Hina Sakurada
(A Lesson in Temptation) Himawari has never had a boyfriend in all her seventeen years, and she has also rejected every person who has ever confessed to her. But when she meets her new, shining and beautiful student, Taiyou, all reason just flies out the window.

[*]6) Platonic Porno by Komomo Yamada
The go-to girl for love advice has never had a boyfriend? Her geeky chameleon teacher finds out, but how? How can a chameleon teacher also be an erotic novelist?!
(Also included in Kojin Jugyou)
